text:
PlacePass | Boston, MA ONSITE | placepass.com

We're a diverse team united by a single vision: to connect people to great experiences, all over the world. Our product services a direct B2C marketplace as well as white-label partnerships with several large partners such as Marriott, Hertz, United Airlines, and Southwest Airlines. We're a rapidly growing series A startup (~25 full time employees) looking for senior engineers to join our team.

To Apply: Sr Software Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/placepass/093006f4-5398-421b-818f-85dc...
